title: Nubian Festival Returns to Aswan
summary: Aswan celebrated the Nubian Festival with hundreds of visitors. The event featured traditional music, food, and crafts.

title: New Nile Corniche Project Launched
summary: Aswan launched its new Nile Corniche project as part of the cityâ€™s tourism and infrastructure development plan.

title: Handicraft Fair Showcases Nubian Heritage
summary: A new fair was opened to display local handmade Nubian products as part of an initiative to support traditional artisans.
